title: 794-798 Dixie Ave NE #794-12
description: Retro, Fully Renovated 2 Bedroom-Walk to Beltline and Inman Park!! Inman Court, a quaint mid-century community nestled in the heart of the historic Inman Park neighborhood, consists of smartly updated two-bedroom apartments. Inman Court Apartments are an excellent value for the superb in-town and pet-friendly community of Inman Park. Experience the many wonderful features that Inman Park has to offer. This property is pet-friendly for cats and dogs.

importantInformation.viewings: By appointment only. Contact the manager for more information.
